mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 1912) for an order placed by the Cedarwood Publishing Company for 300 one color 8.5 x 11" posters advertising "Life's Gone and Slipped Away" written by: Webb Pierce, Lucky Moeller, and Max Powell. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
